name: Immortal Fate
description:
Delusion. Sometimes we can be deluded in some little things. Sometimes a couple of days, a month or a year. But what if some thought lives in you all your life? A harmful thought that eats a piece of you every day. This is delusion.

Solve puzzles, learn Ed's story, help him ... Worked on the game:

Marat Khasanov: https://vk.com/marakhass

Deshi: https://vk.com/kohanadeshi

Alfredo Marconi: https://vk.com/donevadon

PR

***
This game, characters, locations, quests and storyline were created exclusively for the $ 104 Adventure Game Challenge.

***
Some of the ducking amazing content was cut because 2 weeks are too short for such a cool idea ;^;
***
